response: To return a product, go to your Orders page, select the item, and follow the return instructions.

alternatives.answer: To return a product, go to your Orders page, select the item, and follow the return instructions.
If your order is delayed, please allow 24–48 hours. If it still hasn’t arrived, contact our support team with your order number.
Yes, you can exchange a product within 14 days of delivery, subject to product condition.
